page.title: 06The People
page.content: The{population}is{widely scattered} and is probably of above average age. It consists of a high proportion of {retired people,}long-established{ {farmers}and{businessmen and women,}the latter living in converted farms, barns and farm cottages. Many of the women have full-time or part-time employment. Most of the population is relatively wealthy, and car ownership often extends to two or three per family. The keeping and riding of horses, the installation of tennis courts and swimming pools, give an indication of the life-styles of many local residents.The number of young families living in the area seems low, possibly due to the high price of property and the need for a car due to the limited availability of public transport.
